locations.name: Dal Lake, Srinagar
locations.description: Famous for its shikara rides and houseboats, Dal Lake is one of the most iconic boating destinations in India.

locations.name: Chilika Lake, Odisha
locations.description: Asia's largest brackish water lagoon, perfect for boating while spotting Irrawaddy dolphins and migratory birds.

locations.name: Hussain Sagar Lake, Hyderabad
locations.description: This heart-shaped lake offers boat rides with views of the iconic Buddha statue in the center.

locations.name: Vembanad Lake, Kerala
locations.description: The longest lake in India and part of Kerala's famous backwaters, perfect for houseboat cruises.

locations.name: Naini Lake, Nainital
locations.description: A picturesque lake in the Kumaon foothills offering rowboats, paddle boats, and yacht rides.

locations.name: Loktak Lake, Manipur
locations.description: Known for its floating phumdis (islands), Loktak Lake is a mesmerizing boating destination in Northeast India.

locations.name: Sukhna Lake, Chandigarh
locations.description: A man-made lake at the foothills of the Himalayas, perfect for pedal boating and scenic evening rides.

locations.name: Bhavani Island, Andhra Pradesh
locations.description: Located in the Krishna River, Bhavani Island offers speed boating, jet skiing, and houseboat experiences.

locations.name: Pichola Lake, Udaipur
locations.description: A historic lake known for its romantic boat rides with views of City Palace and the Lake Palace.

locations.name: Tehri Lake, Uttarakhand
locations.description: A massive artificial reservoir offering adventure boating, jet skiing, and water sports in the Himalayas.
